abstract: Dominican Republic issues warrants for arrest of European Parliament member Aymeric Chauprade and French citizens Christophe Naudin and Pierre Malinowski; men are accused of helping two French pilots flee from country after they were convicted on charges of trafficking cocaine.
lead_paragraph: The warrants sought the arrests of three French citizens who allegedly helped a pair of French pilots convicted on cocaine trafficking charges flee by speedboat in October.

headline.main: Dominican Republic: Warrants Seek Frenchmen in ‘Air Cocaine’ Escape
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Dominican Republic: Warrants Seek Frenchmen in ‘Air Cocaine’ Escape

snippet: The warrants sought the arrests of three French citizens who allegedly helped a pair of French pilots convicted on cocaine trafficking charges flee by speedboat in October.
